creator: Extreme Games Production
descriptionHtml:
Extreme Car Driving Highway Racing 2019

Here we launched the best speed & top racing game 3 in 1 free gaming street loved by racers, Car Driving, demolition derby car crash and show what your tuned cars are capable against our crazy cars! Real racingz, drift in the azphalt, only for best speed. Bring extreme car speed driving experience, be the king of street racing and traffic racing in cars. Improve your racing drive skills in racing car drive mode, and take part in the race simulator competition with your friends who are champs of racing 2017, now become the best amongst all crazy car traffic street racers. Take a test drive on your favorite crazy race car and to traffic race in different modes in street scene. Show your rivals that you are the best in real highway race competition with amazing best speed. Take unbelievable turns, toque burnout, achieve the highest possible velocity racers to win a twisted metal. To be the strongest permainan mobil, driving skill need to exercise in the different mode of competition like free mode racing, traffic racing, demo derby mode, so start racing in arcade style, perform amazing stunts. The unique mix of all modes in arcade action and simulation way of driving is ultimate amazing free game. Start car driving and earning rewards, collect coins in every mode and diamonds on the free racing, traffic races. Drag your career into high stake racing.

Experience the undergraduate and most realistic car driving simulation free game, top speed past civilian vehicles and drift around NY city and open car parks after the race ends. Start the road smash, demo derby destruction with your rivals and partner for gaining maximum scores this will help you to unlock more sports cars which are best of driving simulators. In fastest sports car driving simulator games you may flip and wreck the car with real-time vehicle derby, damage, each collides or road crash will make more realistic dents, destructions, and scratches in this pull drive game. One of the best car driving simulators in extreme car racing games 2019 and also the top ranking in crazy games, games crazy, car wars games. Win coins, rewards, and trophies to unlock racing cars select the best car for racing. Drift and drive fast cause you don’t need to obey the city traffic rules & score will reflect that racing-in-car drift games 2019.

- Earn cash and rewards by winning each or all game levels to unlock your cars
- The racing cars the way your own choice you want
- Select your favorite control touch or tilt to steer road smash
- Realistic highway car driving feeling racing crazy game
- Awesome and UNIQUE environments!
- Nerve-wracking high speed road smashing action.
- Real-time car destruction and demo derby damage.
- Surreal visual effects of damages/destruction.
- Realistic car physics and smooth controls.

Have fun smashing and destroying your adversaries in this incredible car smashing, destruction derby game, but understand that the crashing game is a quite accurate car simulation of the real demolition derby! In this derby simulator limiting car derby damage is key to becoming victorious and also destroy your opponents and rivals. Always try to smash, crash rivals in the side of their vehicle or from the rear become the king of demolition derby games 2019. A reckless head-on collision, on the other hand, should be avoided to prevent your engine to die or other extreme damage to occur. To boost the damage you inflict on a rival you can get your motor rev up and run faster by using the nitro boost. Nitro boosts and other power-ups for can be purchased before the race.
